name: PG PUBLISHING COMPANY, INC. d/b/a the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, Appellant v. GOVERNOR'S OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION and the Pennsylvania Department of Education, Appellees
name_abbreviation: PG Publishing Co. v. Governor's Office of Administration

parties: PG PUBLISHING COMPANY, INC. d/b/a the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, Appellant v. GOVERNOR’S OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION and the Pennsylvania Department of Education, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of April, 2016, Appellant’s Application for Oral Argument is DENIED, Amicus’ Application for Oral Argument is DENIED, and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
135 A.3d 578
PG PUBLISHING COMPANY, INC. d/b/a the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, Appellant v. GOVERNOR’S OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION and the Pennsylvania Department of Education, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 25, 2016.
